类 FakeDelegate<D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zfy.adapter.delegate.impl.BaseDelegate
      • com.zfy.adapter.delegate.impl.BaseViewDelegate
        • com.zfy.adapter.delegate.impl.FakeDelegate<D>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IDelegate, FakeRef<D>

    public class FakeDelegate<D>
extends BaseViewDelegate
implements FakeRef<D>
    CreateAt : 2018/11/5 Describe :

    当 Empty 显示时，LoadMore 会自动停止
